title: Unexpected definition for an identifier in pattern Err
body:
```
error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic 
note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. 
note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#bug-reports 
note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` for a backtrace
```

Happened on a private project so I can't release the source and I haven't been able to reduce it down to a small test case yet. It happened when I removed a large number of modules to move into a crate without updating the `use`s.

```
rustc 1.12.0-nightly (34f35ed29 2016-07-17)
binary: rustc
commit-hash: 34f35ed29c8acdbe1e3c172786fc41d6f4fb6090
commit-date: 2016-07-17
host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
release: 1.12.0-nightly
```
